channel.title: RS - Got hacked a while back, got it back today, but
channel.description:
It has a 6 month subscription on it. I changed the recovery questions, registered e-mail address, linked my facebook account to it, changed the password a few times, i'm worried about losing the account again.
tl;dr Is a 6 month subscription enough to get the account recovered back?

item.title: RS - Got hacked a while back, got it back today, but
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Phaze One:

As long as you have a safe email registered to your account, you should be absolutely fine.

I made a brand new one to support it, and will be written on paper.

Read full topic

item.title: RS - Got hacked a while back, got it back today, but
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Jmood:

Since you have the email and facebook done you should have a high rate of keeping it, the only way for them to get your account is if they know all your other details.

They never changed the previous security questions to the account, which were the ones I added. I also have a month subscription receipt back from 07. They have a bank pin, so in 3 days i’m going to sell all the stuff and transfer it over.

Read full topic
item.source: RS - Got hacked a while back, got it back today, but
